stories.title: Start Progress Bar
stories.description: As a user, I want to start the progress bar so that I can see the progress visually.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the progress bar is at 0%, When I click the button with text 'Start', Then the progress bar should begin incrementing and display the current progress percentage.

stories.title: Stop Progress Bar
stories.description: As a user, I want to stop the progress bar so that I can control the progress display.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the progress bar is started, When I click the button with text 'Stop', Then the progress bar should pause and display its current percentage.
